metadata.title: CVE-2018-18718 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gThumb through 3.6.2. There is a double-free vulnerability in the add_themes_from_dir method in dlg-contact-sheet.c because of two successive calls of g_free, each of which frees the same buffer.

criterions.comment: gthumb package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:3.6.2-2').
